pages.text: We have a number of new villager professions included in this pack! Some are provided by the $(o)More Villagers$() mod, and others are from the $(o)Miniblock Merchants$() mod.

pages.title: Miniblock Merchants
pages.text: As you play, you may come across special miniblocks in chests or when breaking certain blocks. Use one of these items on a villager to change them to the corresponding profession. $(l)The villager must be unemployed for this to work!$()

pages.title: More Villagers
pages.text: For the professions coming from $(o)More Villagers$(), you simply craft their workstation and grant the villager their profession like normal.
